question: At which among the following conferences, a 34 point resolution was passed by which the Indian National Army was made subordinate to the Indian Independence League?
explanation: The Bangkok Conference was organized on 15th June 1942. Indian Independence League was formed with its first president Rashbehari Bose. During the conference, a thirty-four set resolution (Bangkok resolutions) was adopted that attempted to define the role of the league in the Independence movement.
